titleStmt.title: A vindication of some objections lately raised against Dr. John Colbatch his hipothesis : together with some observations on his essay of alkaly and acid and it's [sic] appendix. / By Dr. Francis Tuthill of Dorchester.
titleStmt.author: Tuthill, Francis.
Colbatch, John, Sir, 1670-1729. Doctrine of acids in the cure of diseases farther asserted.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for A. and J. Churchill, and for Robert Gaylhard bookseller in Corchester,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Marsh's Library, St. Patrick's, Dublin, Ireland.
